name: Stripe API
integration_details: To integrate Stripe, use their official SDK and follow the setup guide linked above.

name: Twilio API
purpose: Cloud communications platform for SMS, voice, and video.
integration_details: Twilio provides SDKs for many platforms. Use the integration guides for setup.

name: Firebase SDK
purpose: Backend platform offering authentication, database, analytics.
integration_details: Use the official Firebase SDK for integration with web or mobile apps.

name: Google Maps API
purpose: Provides mapping, geolocation, and places data services.
integration_details: Use Google Maps Platform SDKs and APIs as per documentation for integration.

name: Slack API
purpose: Messaging platform API for bots, notifications, and integrations.
integration_details: Use Slack’s Web and Events APIs or SDKs to build integrations.

name: SendGrid API
purpose: Email delivery and marketing API for transactional email services.
integration_details: Integrate via SendGrid’s HTTP API or official libraries.
